comments:
I got the NPE below while working in a runtime workbench... Admittedly I was in an inconsistent state due to a problem in core.resources, but I thought it worth reporting because PluginModelManager.findModel(IProject) clearly can return null and it is not being checked for null by the caller in this case.

!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException encountered while running Plug-in Manifest Builder.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ExtensionsErrorReporter.<init>(ExtensionsErrorReporter.java:68)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.PluginBaseErrorReporter.<init>(PluginBaseErrorReporter.java:25)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.PluginErrorReporter.<init>(PluginErrorReporter.java:20)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.checkFile(ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:80)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.checkThisProject(ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:44)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.builders.ManifestConsistencyChecker.build(ManifestConsistencyChecker.java:33)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$2.run(BuildManager.java:593)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:785)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:168)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager$1.run(BuildManager.java:231)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Platform.run(Platform.java:785)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuild(BuildManager.java:234)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.basicBuildLoop(BuildManager.java:253)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.BuildManager.build(BuildManager.java:282)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.doBuild(AutoBuildJob.java:143)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.AutoBuildJob.run(AutoBuildJob.java:204)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
